definition: the flattened weblike part of a feather consisting of a series of barbs on either side of the shaft
details:
noun
- the flattened weblike part of a feather consisting of a series of barbs on either side of the shaft
= synonyms: web
- flat surface that rotates and pushes against air or water
= synonyms: blade
- a fin attached to the tail of an arrow, bomb or missile in order to stabilize or guide it
- mechanical device attached to an elevated structure
= synonyms: weather vane, wind vane, weathervane
